articles.title: These areas of the US at ‘elevated’ risk of blackouts this summer - The Hill
articles.description: Large swathes of the U.S. could suffer blackouts this summer, according to the annual assessment from the North American Electric Reliability Corporation (NERC).

articles.author: Michiko Tomioka
articles.title: I’m a nutritionist from Japan, home to the world’s longest-living people—here are 6 American foods I never eat - CNBC
articles.description: Nutritionist and longevity expert Michiko Tomioka was born and raised in Japan, where some of the world's longest-living people live. To stay healthy and young, here are six toxic foods she never eats in America — and what she eats instead every day.
articles.content:
Growing up in Japan, I fell in love with food at a young age. One of my favorite things to do is to cook for friends and family.
